agents.name: PMO-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Own project timelines, dependencies, and executive updates across teams.

agents.name: QA-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Define test strategy, acceptance criteria, and release quality checks.

agents.name: Automation-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Build automations for repetitive workflows and operational efficiency.

agents.name: Sales-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Drive lead conversion and pipeline follow-ups.

agents.name: Invoice-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Generate invoices, dispatch billing notes, and track payment dates.

agents.name: Collections-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Manage payment reminders, overdue escalations, and receivables risk.

agents.name: Performance-Marketing-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Run paid growth campaigns with CAC/ROAS tracking.

agents.name: Content-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Plan and create content calendars, copy, and campaign assets.

agents.name: SEO-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Own keyword strategy, technical SEO, and organic traffic growth.

agents.name: Product-Manager-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Prioritize product backlog and define release scope.

agents.name: Customer-Research-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Synthesize user feedback and identify feature opportunities.

agents.name: Growth-Experiment-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Design and run growth experiments across funnel stages.

agents.name: Tech-Lead-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Own architecture, coding standards, and technical decision quality.

agents.name: Frontend-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Build responsive UI, interaction systems, and frontend performance.

agents.name: Backend-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Develop APIs, business logic, and secure data flows.

agents.name: DevOps-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Manage CI/CD, cloud deployments, monitoring, and uptime.

agents.name: Fullstack-Architect-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Design end-to-end app architecture and integration patterns.

agents.name: Fullstack-Builder-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Implement full-stack features from backlog to production.

agents.name: API-Integration-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Integrate third-party APIs and internal service contracts.

agents.name: Database-Design-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Define schemas, indexes, migration plans, and data integrity.

agents.name: Testing-Automation-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Create integration/e2e test suites and test pipelines.

agents.name: Release-Manager-Agent
agents.jobDescription: Coordinate release trains, rollback strategy, and release notes.

spawnRules: If queue > 20 tasks, split overloaded specialist into two focused agents
If blocked tasks > 5 in a lane, auto-assign PMO-Agent for unblock plan
If SLA breach risk > 20%, escalate to Keith Anderson
Use tier3 models only for high-stakes architecture or critical client communication
